China eases visa application for U.S. touristsChina will simplify visa applications for tourists from the United States from Jan. 1, cutting the documents required, according to a notice on Friday on the website of the Chinese embassy in Washington. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 07:09:10 GMT KJBZ2CDRG5JXVK3K7KHPLECBSE https://www.reuters.com/world/china-eases-visa-application-us-tourists-2023-12-30/Reuters世界
Thunderstorms batter Australia's east, heatwave grips northSevere thunderstorms battered parts of eastern Australia on Saturday, bringing heavy rain, giant hail and strong winds, days after another storm hit the region over the Christmas holidays. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 05:47:46 GMT RTFFXGBLHRKXBJRN2ZC45VGZ3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thunderstorms-batter-australias-east-heatwave-grips-north-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
McDonald's Malaysia sues Israel boycott movement for $1 mln in damagesMcDonald's Malaysia has sued a movement promoting boycotts against Israel for "false and defamatory statements" that it says hurt its business, seeking damages amounting to 6 million ringgit ($1.31 million). Sat, 30 Dec 2023 05:30:01 GMT N36ZZNQZEBPXZNRLDR3QUCWD3A https://www.reuters.com/world/mcdonalds-malaysia-sues-israel-boycott-movement-1-mln-damages-2023-12-30/Reuters世界
Two South Koreans released after being kidnapped in NigeriaTwo South Koreans kidnapped by gunmen in Nigeria earlier this month have been released safely, Seoul's foreign ministry said on Saturday. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 02:46:55 GMT L3ZBDRGX5JMOTH4ESIUEJDEYSE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/two-south-koreans-released-after-being-kidnapped-nigeria-2023-12-30/Reuters世界非洲
US man charged for attempt to aid al Shabaab after Oct 7 attack on IsraelA New Jersey man arrested in Kenya has been charged for trying to aid militant Islamist group al Shabaab, the U.S. Justice Department said, alleging he was motivated by Hamas' Oct. 7 attack on Israel to wage violence. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 01:16:42 GMT 5ISBODGUM5KJLKFUBL24TQN7QA https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-man-charged-attempt-aid-al-shabaab-after-oct-7-attack-israel-2023-12-30/Kanishka Singh世界美国
Fighting between Israeli forces and Hamas rages after nearly 200 killed in GazaFierce Israeli tank fire and aerial bombing struck Khan Younis in the Gaza Strip on Friday night, residents said, after nearly 200 people were reported killed in 24 hours in Israel's campaign against Hamas militants. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 00:07:22 GMT 2CPK6YTQRFIZ7B6N6CERQ3GO3I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/fighting- Between-israeli-forces-hamas-rages-after-nearly-200-killed-gaza-2023-12-30/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Arafat Barbakh世界中东
Arrests of Catholic priests in Nicaragua tick up as dragnet intensifiesNicaraguan police on Friday arrested three more Catholic priests, bringing the number of clergymen detained this week to at least nine, according to sources close to the local church leadership, including one who is a high-ranking church member. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 23:19:02 GMT LXD6PDXAMVNE3GMHEU4RZ5X5HY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/arrests-catholic-priests-nicaragua-tick-up-dragnet-intensizes-2023-12-29/Ismael Lopez世界美洲
Russian military says 13 Ukrainian rockets downed in southern Belgorod regionRussia's Defence Ministry said its anti-aircraft units destroyed 13 Ukrainian rockets over the southern Belgorod region on Friday and the regional governor said one person was killed and four injured in the incidents. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:42:03 GMT ZTVEWQTKYZLMZJUJUWYMFNKIHY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-military-says-13-ukrainian-rockets-downed-southern-belgorod-region-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
US skips congressional review to approve sale of artillery projectiles to IsraelU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken has approved the sale to Israel of 155 mm artillery shells and related equipment without congressional review, the Pentagon said on Friday. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 22:04:11 GMT ZIRRQVNRVNKZHOEHAITY3GUZXI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-skips-congressional-review-approve-sale-artillery-projectiles-israel-2023-12-29/Reuters世界
Congo election body says it will meet deadline for presidential resultsThe head of Democratic Republic of Congo's election commission on Friday said it would meet a Dec. 31 deadline for the release of full provisional presidential results, dismissing opposition calls for a re-run of the disputed vote as the response of "bad losers." Fri, 29 Dec 2023 21:33:24 GMT EK2BBVAYFFPU5GBFVYEFHZ3WYA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-election-body-says-it-will-meet-deadline-presidential-results-2023-12-29/Ange Kasongo, Benoit Nyemba世界非洲
Russia's air assault on Ukraine draws criticism at UN Security Council meetingRussia drew sharp criticism at the UN Security Council on Friday for launching massive missile and drone attacks against Ukraine, after Kyiv and its supporters called for an urgent meeting of the 15-member body to address the strikes. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 20:11:42 GMT ASVBM2PPUBKMHMFLSY3GN6KAVY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/un-security-council-meet-ukraine-after- Russia-attacks-2023-12-29/Simon Lewis世界欧洲
